azurerm_app_service_virtual_network_swif.description: Manages an App Service Virtual Network Association.

app_service_id.description: The ID of the App Service to associate to the VNet. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

subnet_id.description: The ID of the subnet the app service will be associated to (the subnet must have a `service_delegation` configured for `Microsoft.Web/serverFarms`).

id.description: The ID of the App Service Virtual Network Association

create.description: Used when creating the App Service Virtual Network Association.

update.description: Used when updating the App Service Virtual Network Association.

read.description: Used when retrieving the App Service Virtual Network Association.

delete.description: Used when deleting the App Service Virtual Network Association.
